Reviews.Title: Great Laptop!
Reviews.Author: jd
Reviews.Content: Asus is Definitely the best computer brand out there.  This computer is no exception to the quality of their products.  This is the perfect balance of Performance and Price.  I would Highly recommend this Laptop to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent prize and performance
Reviews.Author: Gerardo Aquino
Reviews.Content: The laptop works really good and it has a very good performance, the prize is low compared with all that you can have with this laptop.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: M. Chen
Reviews.Content: I've only had it for a month, but it's already making me consider buy ASUS laptops instead of Lenovos. I do appreciate the additional number pad too.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Adina
Reviews.Content: Light, thin, classy! I love the case, i hate Windows 8. It has voice command and it makes it seem even more advanced. ;)

Reviews.Title: Not Amazing
Reviews.Author: Anastasia Hulet
Reviews.Content: Its not as good as I expected. I have the same problem as another customer where the spacebar doesn't register sometimes. The battery life isn't very long so it has to stay plugged in for most of the time. The Startup is also a little slow. So overall rating, not impressed. Gonna return It and buy a different computer.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Geralyn Mercado
Reviews.Content: It's a fast computer, I love windows 8 personality because it's like been working with a tablet.  Not heavy computer and very good size for students.

Reviews.Title: Fast, lightweight, buggy OS.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this to be part of a portable recording rig. During the first couple of weeks after I bought it, it would freeze unexpectedly; almost to the point that I considered returning it. However, after a little tweaking and a few updates (which unfortunately come often) it is performing very well.

Reviews.Title: Great team, great price, and fast delivery.
Reviews.Author: hectorvarillas
Reviews.Content: *** The equipment is excellent, the sharpness of the image makes a great change. A big hello and successes to sellers of this store and its owner for me.*** El equipo es excelente, la nitidez de la imagen hace el gran cambio. Un gran saludo y exitos a los vendedores de esta tienda y a su dueño de mi parte.

Reviews.Title: FIX THIS PLEASE!!!
Reviews.Author: Michael Ackley
Reviews.Content: I loved it until motherboard failed. I had my IT service contact Asus and still have not heard from them other than service #. I did fax in my record of purchase from Amazon. I need this fixed I'm a doctor on electronic medical records. Did hear back and sent in for repair, still waiting.  12/12/13

Reviews.Title: only few probs
Reviews.Author: Marisha
Reviews.Content: the major problem im having with is is that the space bar does not work if you only gently tap it or if you tap it on the edges. You have to hit it directly in the middle and with considerable force for it to work, also sometimes it goes back to the tile screen in the middle of my browsing. other than that no problem but the spacebar is quite annoying

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i5 3337U 1.8 GHz
4 GB DDR3
500 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
15.6-Inch Screen
Windows 8, 3.5-hour battery life
ProductInfo.Name: ASUS A550CA-EB51 15.6-Inch Laptop (Dark Gray)
